inclusion.criterion: Type 2 pregestational diabetes mellitus treated with multiple daily insulin injections
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hospitalized for antenatal corticosteroid administration in anticipation of preterm birth
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Planned delivery < 72 hours after 1st dose of antenatal corticosteroids
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: More than 6 hours after 1st dose of antenatal corticosteroids
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes, not type 2. He is currently homeless and lost his insulin supply.
